short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a download button for Twitter DM/GC videos

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save those ðŸ’Žs with the click of a button! Adds a function Twitter/X should have natively but doesn't. Other media downloader extensions do not include this as a feature, and there isn't a working solution out there if you look it up. With this extension, whenever you click the 3 dots next to any video in a DM or group chat, you can save it to your PC.
